Caliptra WDT STATUS register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x104
Size:
0x4

Description

Caliptra watchdog timer status register
Caliptra Access: RW
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:2] - - - -
[1] t2_timeout rw 0x0 -
[0] t1_timeout rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

t2_timeout

Timer2 timed out

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b

t1_timeout

Timer1 timed out, timer2 enabled

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b
